name: Desktop Girls - New Girls
detailed_description:
NEW GIRLS - NEW OUTFITS


The poll we created few weeks ago — about what additional content you would like to see as a DLC — receive many answers.
Those answers were pretty heterogeneous so we decided to try to satisfy as many requests as possible.

Therefore we are glad to introduce you the first DLC: DESKTOP GIRLS – NEW GIRLS.

By installing this additional content the number of girls to choose from raises to 8 (though always having a maximum of 4 on the desktop). These 4 new girls are: Kristin, Sun, Claudia and Roxanne. And that's not all, as they will wear 4 new outfits each one (a part for the bunny outfit).

We hope you'll enjoy the new content and continue to provide us with your valuable feedback to Desktop Girls keep improving.

short_description: New Girls and Outfits for Desktop Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvdia geforce GTX 660 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.4 ghz intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia geforce GTX 980 4 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In this application is possible to see some parts of the female human body naked
